name: Happy Sweet 16, Tom Swifty Quiz | Word Play | 10 Questions

questions.text:
EXAMPLE: "I like camping," said Tom ___.  The answer is INTENTLY. 

Note: The spellings are always correct English, although the pronunciation may not be. The hint will tell the number of words and letters.  Also the beginning and last letters IE: S/LY or S/D.  

QUESTION ONE:  "That was a short golf shot", Tom ___ in.
questions.explanation:
Chipped.

	A short golf shot is a chip shot.

Exclaimed.

	If you owned a mine, you have an ex-claim on it.

questions.text: "Another plate of steamers all around!" Tom ___.
"Okay, you can switch on the electric chair now", said Tom ___.
questions.explanation:
Conceitedly.

	A convict may sit in the electric chair...Con Seat.

questions.text: "The prisoners set up a corporation", the warden ___.
questions.explanation:
Confirmed.

	A prison corporation = a Con Firm.

questions.text: "We could use the Geiger-Muller method to check for radiation leaks", Tom ___.
questions.explanation:
Countered.

	You would use a Geiger Counter to check for radiation.

questions.text: "This is how he murdered the mystery writer", Tom ___.
"I speak British English, of course", Di ___ to say.
questions.explanation:
Elected.

	British English could be a dialect.

questions.text: "My spinal cord has been terminated", Tom ___.
questions.explanation:
Fired Back.

	If your spinal cord has been terminated, your back has been fired.

questions.text: "I hope you're not afraid of needles", Tom ___.
questions.explanation:
Injected.

	A needle is an injection.
